s: It is with great regret that I announce the closure of Gallo & Spence Toys. This means that the Piki Piki Bike will no longer be available. Rising costs have forced us to take this unfortunate decision. Our sincere thanks to all who have bought Piki Piki Bikes over the past few years.

t: Piki Piki Bike | People Of Play
s: The patented Piki Piki Bike is a ride-on that toddlers can use easily & with confidence right out the box. It is the ONLY ride-on that is steerable AND stable AND easily propelled by toddlers. It is stable & requires no balancing and is available in 3 colors - blue, red and pink.

Is there a way to buy a replacement wheel? We’ve had ours about 7 months and absolutely love it. However, the front wheel split down the center. ... Uploading in progress... Finishing up... Upload complete! ... We bought a replacement bike when an older kid (way too big) broke our grandsons bike.
